question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-v2-file-store-backfiller/src/lib.rs] [Struct: IndexerGrpcV2FileStoreBackfillerConfig] [Symlink Attack] Can progress_file_path be a symlink to a sensitive file, causing the backfiller to overwrite critical system files when updating progress? (High)

(Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-v2-file-store-backfiller/src/processor.rs] [Function: backfill()] [GRPC Stream Memory] Does the GRPC stream on line 171 buffer all responses in memory, or can a malicious fullnode cause memory exhaustion by streaming massive responses? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-v2-file-store-backfiller/src/processor.rs] [Function: do_upload()] [Transaction Vector Clone] Are transactions cloned unnecessarily before FileEntry::from_transactions on line 239, causing double memory usage for large batches? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-v2-file-store-backfiller/src/processor.rs] [Function: backfill()] [Task Spawn Limit] Can spawning backfill_processing_task_count tasks on line 128 without rate limiting cause thread pool exhaustion on systems with limited resources? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-v2-file-store-backfiller/src/processor.rs] [Function: backfill()] [Scope Stack Overflow] Can deeply nested or recursive tokio_scoped::scope calls on line 127 cause stack overflow in extreme scenarios? (Low)
